614  // This function is a (slow) way to set properties on the widget, no matter what type it is.
615  // When the requested property doesn't exist in the widget then the functions will return false.
617  virtual bool setProperty(std::string property, const std::string& value);
618 
621  // This function is a (slow) way to get properties of the widget, no matter what type it is.
